structure.unit: A KENTUCKY UNIFORM UNINCORPORATED NONPROFIT ASSOCIATION ACT

text.section: An unincorporated nonprofit association may acquire, hold, encumber, or transfer in its name an interest in real, personal, or intangible property.
An unincorporated nonprofit association may be a beneficiary of a trust or contract, a legatee, or a devisee.

law.history: Created 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 34, sec. 14, effective June 24, 2015.
